mapper.select: SELECT T.typeID, T.typeName, M.materialTypeID, M.quantity FROM invtypes T INNER JOIN invTypeMaterials M on M.typeID=T.typeID INNER JOIN invGroups G on G.groupID=T.groupID INNER JOIN invTypes MT on MT.typeID=M.materialTypeID AND G.allowRecycler=1 AND MT.groupID=18;
SELECT T.typeID, T.typeName, M.materialTypeID, M.quantity FROM invtypes T INNER JOIN invTypeMaterials M on M.typeID=T.typeID INNER JOIN invGroups G on G.groupID=T.groupID AND G.allowRecycler=1;

SELECT T.typeID, T.typeName, M.materialTypeID, M.quantity FROM invtypes T INNER JOIN invTypeMaterials M on M.typeID=T.typeID INNER JOIN invGroups G on G.groupID=T.groupID AND G.allowRecycler=1 AND G.categoryID=#{id}

SELECT T.typeID, T.typeName, M.materialTypeID, M.quantity, MT.typeName as materialName FROM invtypes T INNER JOIN invTypeMaterials M on M.typeID=T.typeID INNER JOIN invGroups G on G.groupID=T.groupID INNER JOIN invTypes MT on MT.typeID=M.materialTypeID WHERE T.typeID IN #{item}
